property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — Destroy target blue permanent; or return target Island to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Except for creatures named Akron Legionnaire and artifact creatures, creatures you control can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — Target player gains X life; or prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity."—D'Avenant proverb

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile All Hallow's Eve with two scream counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if All Hallow's Eve is exiled with a scream counter on it, remove a scream counter from it. If there are no more scream counters on it, put it into your graveyard and each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quick and agile, Amrou Kithkin can usually escape from even the most fearsome opponents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Another target Minotaur creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestors are the wisdom of the tribe and the soul of the Homelands. I am eternally in their debt."—Taysir

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Spirit Crafters sing of all our people. They sing of those lost, of those found, and of those who are yet to be."—Onatah, Anaba Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{W}{U}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Activate this ability only before the combat damage step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Battles no longer served a purpose in Karakas." —Angus Mackenzie, Diary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack a player unless that player cast a spell or put a nontoken permanent onto the battlefield during his or her last turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Arcades Sabboth unless you pay {G}{W}{U}. Each untapped creature you control gets +0/+2 as long as it's not attacking. {W}: Arcades Sabboth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Legendary creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. When Arena of the Ancients enters the battlefield, tap all legendary creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile two target nonartifact creatures. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All rivers eventually run to the sea. My job is to sort out who goes first."—Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever a creature dealt damage by Axelrod Gunnarson this turn dies, you gain 1 life and Axelrod deals 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}: Banshee deals half X damage, rounded down, to target creature or player, and half X damage, rounded up, to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say Banshees are the hounds of Death, baying to herd their prey into the arms of their master.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He is devious and cunning, in both appearance and deed. Beware the Warbeard, for this brute bites as well as he barks!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a dozen years the Cage had held Lord Ith, but as the Pretender Mairsil's power weakened, so did the bars.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Bartel Runeaxe can't be the target of Aura spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thundering down from Hammerheim, no foe could slow Bartel's charge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Black Vise enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Black Vise deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Battle of Pitdown, Lady Ursnell fashioned the first such instrument out of Lord Ursnell's left leg.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "O! call back yesterday, bid time return."—William Shakespeare, King Richard the Second

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}{R}, {T}: Put a 1/1 black and red Demon creature token named Minor Demon onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At Red Cliffs, Kongming and Zhou Yu each wrote his plan for defeating Wei on the palm of his hand. They laughed as they both revealed the same word, "Fire."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose four lands you control and destroy those lands. Then target opponent chooses four lands he or she controls. Destroy those lands. Then Burning of Xinye deals 4 damage to each creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Call to Arms enters the battlefield, choose a color and an opponent. White creatures get +1/+1 as long as the chosen color is the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls but isn't tied for most common. When the chosen color isn't the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls or is tied for most common, sacrifice Call to Arms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The province of Jingzhou was the fulcrum of the three kingdoms. At separate times it was coveted and controlled by the Wu, the Shu, and the Wei.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Carrion Ants gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘War is no picnic,' my father liked to say. But the ants seemed to disagree."—General Chanek Valteroth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Chromium unless you pay {W}{U}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cinder Storm deals 7 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the sky's rain has turned to fire, what will put it out?

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Exile a creature you control: Put a storage counter on City of Shadows. {T}: Add {X} to your mana pool, where X is the number of storage counters on City of Shadows.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clouds broke and the sun's rays burst forth; each foul beast in its turn faltered, and was gone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, Sacrifice Coal Golem: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Three such creatures stood burning at the crest of the hill. Only seconds later, the fireball struck our front line."—Lydia, Countess Brellis

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Corrupt Eunuchs enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy Cosmic Horror unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}. If Cosmic Horror is destroyed this way, it deals 7 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Then flashed the living lightning from her eyes,/ And screams of horror rend th' affrighted skies."—Alexander Pope, The Rape of the Lock

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}, {T}: Crimson Manticore deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Noted neither for their good looks nor their charm, manticores can be fearsome allies. As dinner companions, however, they are best left alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dance of Many enters the battlefield, put a token that's a copy of target nontoken creature onto the battlefield. When Dance of Many leaves the battlefield, exile the token. When the token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice Dance of Many. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dance of Many unless you pay {U}{U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Avenant's archers are also trained as poets, so that each arrow is guided by a fragment of verse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lieutenants dishonored, corpses carted home; The general raises troops again to take revenge."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}: You may put a Minotaur permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Play the song of he who delivered us. Play the song of Feroz."—Onatah, Anaba Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast Disharmony only during combat before blockers are declared. Untap target attacking creature and remove it from combat. Gain control of that creature until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Divine Intervention enters the battlefield with two intervention counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an intervention counter from Divine Intervention. When you remove the last intervention counter from Divine Intervention, the game is a draw.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dong Zhou, the Tyrant enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast Eightfold Maze only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are aberrations who have turned on everything we hold sacred. Let them be cast out." —Ailheen, Speaker of the Council

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though they often bore little greater charm than the demons they battled, exorcists were always welcome in Scarwood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other Faerie creatures you control get +0/+1. {T}: Other Faerie creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faeries talk all in riddles and tricky bits, ‘cept the Nobles. Now, there's some straight talkers."—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All warfare is based on deception."—Sun Tzu, Art of War (trans. Giles)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But it was a year of dearth. People were reduced to eating leaves of jujube trees. Corpses were seen everywhere in the countryside."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you have that I cannot obtain?"—Mairsil, called the Pretender

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The burst of strength brought on by this plague should not be mistaken for a sign of renewed health."—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fire Ambush deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With fire he broke the battle at Bowang . . . . Striking fear deep into Cao Cao's soul, thus Kongming scored a coup at his debut."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Fire Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Brimstone marks this drake's territory. Unfortunately for travelers, all of the Burning Isles smell likewise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {G}, {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying If Firestorm Phoenix would die, return Firestorm Phoenix to its owner's hand instead. Until that player's next turn, that player plays with that card revealed in his or her hand and can't play it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bird of wonder dies, the maiden phoenix,/ Her ashes new-create another heir/ As great in admiration as herself."—William Shakespeare, King Henry the Eighth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — Destroy target red permanent; or return target Mountain to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many people say that no power can bring the mountains low. Many people are fools.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leadership, not numbers, determines victory."—A Wu commander, before his 5,000 troops forced 15,000 Wei troops to retreat from Ruxu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forked Lightning deals 4 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a permanent becomes tapped, put a wind counter on it. If a permanent with a wind counter on it would untap during its controller's untap step, remove all wind counters from it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The frost giants have been out in the cold a long, long time, but they have their rage to keep them warm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose flying, first strike, trample, or rampage 3. Gabriel Angelfire gains that ability until your next upkeep. (Whenever a creature with rampage 3 becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
You may play an additional land during your turn if that land is a basic Forest.
Sacrifice Gaea's Touch: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, Sacrifice Gauntlets of Chaos: Exchange control of target artifact, creature, or land you control and target permanent an opponent controls that shares one of those types with it. If those permanents are exchanged this way, destroy all Auras attached to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cao Cao was haunted to death by the ghosts of the empresses and other high courtiers he had murdered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The voices of the dead ring in the heart long after they have faded from the ears.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. You lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One who goes unpunished never learns.—Greek proverb

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) When Guan Yu, Sainted Warrior is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may shuffle Guan Yu into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He Guan Yu covered the ground on a thousand-li horse;/ With dragon blade he took each pass by force."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player discards a card at random. Activate this ability only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urborg became the final resting place of many swordsmen of renown, their steel outmatched by the wiles of Gwendlyn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Halfdane's power and toughness become equal to the power and toughness of target creature other than Halfdane until the end of your next upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hail from Tolaria the ever changing 'Dane.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{T}: Target creature loses all landwalk abilities until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘Tis distance lends enchantment to the view,/ And robes the mountain in its azure hue." —Thomas Campbell, "Pleasures of Hope"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hazezon Tamar enters the battlefield, put X 1/1 Sand Warrior creature tokens that are red, green, and white onto the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep, where X is the number of lands you control at that time. When Hazezon leaves the battlefield, exile all Sand Warriors.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes even the smallest boon can save a life."—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast Heavy Fog only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all nonblack creatures. Hellfire deals X plus 3 damage to you, where X is the number of creatures that died this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "High on a throne of royal state . . . insatiate to pursue vain war with heav'n." —John Milton, Paradise Lost

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You would never guess, at the terrifying sight of the man, that Hunding was as charming a companion as one could wish for."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hunting Cheetah deals damage to an opponent, you may search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}: You may choose a creature card in your hand whose mana cost could be paid by some amount of, or all of, the mana you spent on {X}. If you do, you may cast that card face down as a 2/2 creature spell without paying its mana cost. If the creature that spell becomes as it resolves has not been turned face up and would assign or deal damage, be dealt damage, or become tapped, instead it's turned face up and assigns or deals damage, is dealt damage, or becomes tapped. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The potential for change lies in all things. Know a thing's nature, know its possibilities, and know it anew."—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Creatures named Ivory Guardians get +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a nontoken red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elite guard of the Mesa High Priests, the Ivory Guardians, were created to protect the innocent and faithful. Some say their actions are above the law.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mightiest of the cat warriors, Jedit Ojanen forsook the forests of his tribe and took service with the Robaran Mercenaries, rising through their ranks to lead them in the battle for Efrava.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once, the order of the Closed Fist reached throughout the Kb'Briann Highlands. Now, Jerrard alone remains to uphold their standard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lion's only loyalty is to its hunger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To make a prairie it takes a clover and one bee,/ One clover, and a bee,/ And revery."—Emily Dickinson

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {G}: Killer Bees gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The communal mind produces a savage strategy, yet no one could predict that this vicious crossbreed would unravel the secret of steel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At end of combat, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by Kjeldoran Frostbeast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Two of my Warriors found that the creature was dangerous not only in combat, but also in simple proximity."—Disa the Restless, journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library face down. {0}: Sacrifice Knowledge Vault. If you do, discard your hand, then put all cards exiled with Knowledge Vault into their owner's hand. When Knowledge Vault leaves the battlefield, put all cards exiled with Knowledge Vault into their owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Kobold creatures you control get +0/+1 and have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Joining this army is easy, boy. Just survive your first battle."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Other Kobold creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One for all, all for one; we strike first, and then you're done!" —Oath of the Kobold Musketeers

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Kobold creatures you control get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Taskmaster knows that there is no cure for the common Kobold.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kher Keep is unique among fortresses: impervious to aerial assault but defenseless from the ground.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such a lord as this—all virtues' height—Had never been, nor ever was again."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Labyrinth Minotaur blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I doubt any labyrinth minotaurs still live—but then again, we minotaurs are stubborn beings."—Onatah, Anaba Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Lady Caleria deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{B}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When milady was young, the sight of a rainbow would fill her soul with peace. As she grew, she learned to share her rapture with others."—Lady Gabriella

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not remember what he said to her. I remember her fiery eyes, fixed upon him for an instant. I remember a flash, and the hot breath of sudden flames made me turn away. When I looked again, Angus was gone."—A Wayfarer, on meeting Lady Orca

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent who controls at least as many lands as you do would put a land onto the battlefield, that player instead puts that land onto the battlefield then sacrifices a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: If Lesser Werewolf's power is 1 or more, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn and put a -0/-1 counter on target creature blocking or blocked by Lesser Werewolf. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you do it right, they'll never know what hit them."—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) Liu Bei, Lord of Shu gets +2/+2 as long as you control a permanent named Guan Yu, Sainted Warrior or a permanent named Zhang Fei, Fierce Warrior.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only wisdom and virtue can truly win men's devotion."—Liu Bei

property.name: Rules
property.value: All lands are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Livonya's own nature is a matter of mystery. Nothing is known for sure, merely rumors of unearthly stealth, and unholy alliances.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Loyal Retainers: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste; horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dong Zhuo's man, Lu Bu, warrior without peer,/ Far surpassed the champions of his sphere."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Wu chief commander, Lu Meng conquered Shu-held Jingzhou in 219 by disguising soldiers as merchants on boats filled with hiding troops.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) Whenever Lu Xun, Scholar General deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add {X} to your mana pool, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast Mana Vortex, counter it unless you sacrifice a land. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a land. When there are no lands on the battlefield, sacrifice Mana Vortex.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Marhault Elsdragon follows a strict philosophy, never letting emotions cloud his thoughts. No chance observer could imagine the rage in his heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stubborn Meng Huo was captured and released by Kongming seven times before finally surrendering.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Through his allies, Meng Huo commanded several hundred thousand troops composed of cavalry, rattan-armored warriors, infantry, naked men with swords, and wild animals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mourning families of commanders and generals were often given land, valuables, or money to compensate for their losses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}: Name a card. Target opponent reveals X cards at random from his or her hand. Then that player discards all cards with that name revealed this way. Activate this ability only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, counter it unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These days, some wizards are finding that they have a little too much spell left at the end of their mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards his or her hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature of an opponent's choice instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Old Man of the Sea during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to Old Man of the Sea's power for as long as Old Man of the Sea remains tapped and that creature's power remains less than or equal to Old Man of the Sea's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Palladia-Mors unless you pay {R}{G}{W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{R}: Pavel Maliki gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We all know the legend: Pavel wanders the realms, helping those in greatest need. But is this a measure of his generosity, or of his obligation to atone?

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We three, though of separate ancestry, join in brotherhood. . . . We dare not hope to be together always but hereby vow to die the selfsame day."—Peach Garden Oath

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing worse than a minotaur with an axe is an angry minotaur with an axe.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On the field of honor, a soldier need have no fear."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ramirez DePietro is a most flamboyant pirate. Be careful not to believe his tall tales, especially when you ask his age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rasputin Dreamweaver enters the battlefield with seven dream counters on it. Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Add {1} to your mana pool. Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Rasputin this turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Rasputin started the turn untapped, put a dream counter on it. Rasputin can't have more than seven dream counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Exile Recall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, return a creature card from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield under the control of that creature's owner.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then felt lifeless to the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast Reset only during an opponent's turn after his or her upkeep step. Untap all lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Reveka, Wizard Savant deals 2 damage to target creature or player and doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's nice to see a sister Dwarf in a position of such power, but why'd it have to be one of those seafaring muleheads?"—Halina, Dwarven Trader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains horsemanship. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship. This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All men have their appointed time; that's something no horse can change."—Liu Bei, after being told that the Dilu brings its master ill fortune

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Political violence is a perfectly legitimate answer to the persecution handed down by dignitaries of the state."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {R}{R}{R}. If you don't, tap Rohgahh of Kher Keep and all creatures named Kobolds of Kher Keep, then an opponent gains control of them. Creatures you control named Kobolds of Kher Keep get +2/+2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rolling Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without horsemanship and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Rubinia Soulsinger during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Rubinia and Rubinia remains tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the scryb were very funny anymore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In establishing the Shu kingdom, Liu Bei's forces fought against Ma Chao at Chengdu. Eventually, Ma Chao surrendered and became one of Liu Bei's Tiger Generals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Throughout the three kingdoms, important generals were often guarded by small groups of expert soldiers known as "elite companions."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance; horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Shu Soldier-Farmers enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During Kongming's campaigns against the Wei, his Shu troops rotated from the battlefront to the fields every hundred days.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember Sir Shandlar! Remember and stand firm!" —rallying cry of the Eberyn militia

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the brave have cause to tremble at the sight of Sivitri Scarzam. Who else has tamed Scarzam's Dragon?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Slashing Tiger becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unless you enter the tiger's lair, you cannot get hold of the tiger's cubs." —Sun Tzu, Art of War (trans. Giles)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Sol Grail enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look deep into the Grail, and see there what you desire most."—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose two target blocking creatures an opponent controls. If each of those creatures could block all creatures that the other is blocking, remove both of them from combat. Each one then blocks all creatures the other was blocking. Whenever Sorrow's Path becomes tapped, it deals 2 damage to you and each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and can't be the target of spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What can be a stronger shield than concealment? Have you ever defeated an enemy you didn't know existed?"—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Regenerate Spiny Starfish. At the beginning of each end step, if Spiny Starfish regenerated this turn, put a 0/1 blue Starfish creature token onto the battlefield for each time it regenerated this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stangg enters the battlefield, put a legendary 3/4 red and green Human Warrior creature token named Stangg Twin onto the battlefield. When Stangg leaves the battlefield, exile that token. When that token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice Stangg.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stolen Grain deals 5 damage to target opponent. You gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the battle of Guandu, Cao Cao defeated Yuan Shao by raiding his grain depot, leaving him with no way to feed his troops.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Storm World deals X damage to that player, where X is 4 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Plans evolved within the tent decide a victory 1,000 li away."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) When Sun Ce, Young Conquerer enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have horsemanship. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One score and four he reigned, the Southland king: / A dragon coiled, a tiger poised below the mighty Yangtze."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sunastian has roots in both sorcery and swordplay; he has learned never to depend too heavily on the latter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sword of the Ages enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Sword of the Ages and any number of creatures you control: Sword of the Ages deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way, then exile Sword of the Ages and those creature cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature. When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller chooses a creature that Takklemaggot could enchant. If he or she does, return Takklemaggot to the battlefield under your control attached to that creature. If he or she doesn't, return Takklemaggot to the battlefield under your control as a non-Aura enchantment. It loses "enchant creature" and gains "At the beginning of that player's upkeep, Takklemaggot deals 1 damage to him or her."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tetsuo Umezawa can't be the target of Aura spells. {U}{B}{B}{R}, {T}: Destroy target tapped or blocking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of his or her choice. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An immense river of oblivion is sweeping us away into a nameless abyss." —Ernest Renan, Souvenirs d'Enfance et de Jeunesse

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her given name has been lost in the mists of time. Legend says that her silent vigil will one day be ended by the one who, pure of heart and spirit, calls out that name again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature unless you pay {1}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At end of combat, gain control of all creatures blocking The Wretched for as long as you control The Wretched.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trying to meet a worthy man in the wrong way is as bad as closing the door on an invited guest."—Mencius, a Chinese philosopher

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Administrator of the military state of Sheoltun, Tobias is the military right arm of the empire and the figurehead of its freedom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Tor Wauki deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can you accuse me of evil? Though these deeds be unsavory, no one will argue: good shall follow from them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{G}, {T}: Tracker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Tracker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trip wire, hooked poles, and sunken pits were commonly used to unhorse riders during the Three Kingdoms period.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An explorer of the Æther, Tuknir often discovers himself in the most unusual physical realms.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}: Target creature loses first strike or swampwalk until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Resignedly beneath the sky/The melancholy waters lie./So blend the turrets and shadows there/That all seem pendulous in air,/While from a proud tower in town/Death looks gigantically down."—Edgar Allan Poe, "The City in the Sea"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vaevictis Asmadi unless you pay {B}{R}{G}. {B}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a pin counter on Voodoo Doll. At the beginning of your end step, if Voodoo Doll is untapped, destroy Voodoo Doll and it deals damage to you equal to the number of pin counters on it. {X}{X}, {T}: Voodoo Doll deals damage equal to the number of pin counters on it to target creature or player. X is the number of pin counters on Voodoo Doll.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As many attackers were dazzled by the wall's beauty as were halted by its force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. {U}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target Cleric or Wizard creature this turn. {B}, Put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target player this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cao Cao was more concerned with capabilities than lineage. He excelled at recruiting and retaining men of talent to serve him.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wei won the battle of Hefei when Zhang Liao defeated Sun Quan and then foiled a Wu scheme to incite rebellion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) Whenever Wei Night Raiders deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the battle of Chang'an, Ma Chao defeated the two generals Cao Cao sent to guard the pass but was forced to flee when Cao Cao's trickery turned his own ally against him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: You may put a Faerie permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. {2}{G}: Target green creature gains protection from black until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those of faith are those of strength."—Autumn Willow

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Willow Satyr during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target legendary creature for as long as you control Willow Satyr and Willow Satyr remains tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{G}: Wormwood Treefolk gains forestwalk until end of turn and deals 2 damage to you. {B}{B}: Wormwood Treefolk gains swampwalk until end of turn and deals 2 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the second battle of Ruxu, the brave Wu general Gan Ning raided Cao Cao's camp of 400,000 men with only 100 cavalry. Not a single man or horse was lost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Wu Longbowman deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wu Warship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Both Wu and Wei warships patrolled the Yangtze River, the natural border between the two kingdoms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) Sacrifice Xiahou Dun, the One-Eyed: Return target black card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}{R}{G}, {T}: Target player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A regular guest at the Royal Masquerade, Arien is the envy of the Court. She appears in a new costume every hour.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To send the common people to war untrained is to throw them away."—Confucius, The Analects (trans. Lau)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance; horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zhang Fei's uncharacteristic alliance with a defeated Riverlands general, Yan Yan, allowed Shu forces to advance through forty-five Riverlands strongpoints with no casualties.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Zodiac Dragon is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may return it to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . The kingdoms three are now the stuff of dream,/ For men to ponder, past all praise or blame."
